statgraphics.util
Class Plot2DFactory

java.lang.Object
  statgraphics.GraphicalAnalysis
      statgraphics.PlotFactory
          statgraphics.util.Plot2DFactory

public class Plot2DFactory
extends PlotFactory

This class contains a collection of utility methods for creating some 2D statistical plots.

createPlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createPlot(java.util.Hashtable argument,
                                             java.lang.Object... dataObject)
Creates a plot given the input arguments and data.

Specified by:
createPlot in class PlotFactory
Parameters:
argument - the arguments with the following choices:
Bar plot: DATANAMES, TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Box plot: DATANAMES;
Box plot (time): TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Combined line and bar plot: IS_LINE_PLOT_UPPER, DATANAMES, TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Histogram: DATANAMES, BIN_NUMBER, FREQUENCY_CHOICE, TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Line plot: DATANAMES, TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Line plot (category): DATANAMES, TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Scatter plot: DATANAMES, TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Line plot with points: TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Survival estimate plot: DATANAMES, TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Time series plot: DATANAMES, TITLE, XLABEL, YLABEL;
Pie plot: TITLE.

dataObject - the input data.
Returns:
the created plot.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the length of the category vector should be equal to the one of the input data series.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the number of data series should be equal to the number of data names.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the length of the time vector should be equal to the length of the input data series.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the input datasets should have the same number of data series.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the data series of the two datasets should have the same sample size.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the two input data should have the same sample size.
IllegalArgumentExceptio - the sortedTime vector and sortedSurvivalEstimate vector must have the same length.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the number of time series should be equal to the one of the associated dates.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the length of the data series should be equal to the one of the associated dates.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the length of the time vector should be equal to 6.

createPiePlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createPiePlot(java.lang.String title,
                                                java.lang.String[] category,
                                                double[] counts)
Creates a 2D pie plot.

Parameters:
title - the plot title.
category - the categories the data belong to,
category[j]: the (j+1)'th category.
counts - the number of data corresponding to the categories,
counts[j]: the number of data belonging to the category category[j].
Returns:
the created bar plot.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the length of the category vector should be equal to the one of the input data series.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the number of data series should be equal to the number of data names.

                                                  java.lang.String frequencyChoice,
                                                  java.lang.String title,
                                                  java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                  java.lang.String yLabel,
                                                  double[]... data)
Creates a histogram.

Parameters:
dataNames - the names of the data series,
dataNames[j]: the name of the (j+1)'th data series.
binNumber - the number of bins.
frequencyChoice - the specification of the frequency with the choices "Frequency" or "Relative Frequency".
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
data - the data series,
data[j]: the (j+1)'th data series.
Returns:
the created histogram.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the number of data series should be equal to the number of data names.

createLinePlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createLinePlot(java.lang.String[] dataNames,
                                                 java.lang.String title,
                                                 java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                 java.lang.String yLabel,
                                                 double[][] xData,
                                                 double[][] yData)
Creates a line plot.

Parameters:
dataNames - the names of the data series,
dataNames[j]: the name of the (j+1)'th data series.
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
xData - the x(-coordinate) data values.
yData - the y(-coordinate) data values.
Returns:
the created line plot.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the input datasets should have the same number of data series.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the data series of the two datasets should have the same sample size.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the number of data series should be equal to the number of data names.

createLineAndPointsPlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createLineAndPointsPlot(java.lang.String title,
                                                          java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                          java.lang.String yLabel,
                                                          double[] p1,
                                                          double[] p2,
                                                          double[] xData,
                                                          double[] yData)
Creates a regression plot with a fitted line.

Parameters:
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
p1 - the start of the line,
(p1[0],p1[1]) is the starting point.
p2 - the end of the line,
(p2[0],p2[1]) is the end point.
xData - the data for the x-coordinate.
yData - the data for the y-coordinate.
Returns:
the created regression plot.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the two input data should have the same sample size.

createLineAndPointsPlot

                                                          java.lang.String yLabel,

                                                          double[] p2,
                                                          org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset dataset)
Creates a regression plot with a fitted line using a XYDataset interface.

Parameters:
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
p1 - the start of the line,
(p1[0],p1[1]) is the starting point.
p2 - the end of the line,
(p2[0],p2[1]) is the end point.
dataset - the dataset for the regression plot.
Returns:
the created regression plot.

createSurvivalEstimatePlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createSurvivalEstimatePlot(java.lang.String title,
                                                             java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                             java.lang.String yLabel,
                                                             double[] sortedTime,
                                                             double[] sortedSurvivalEstimate)
Creates a survival estimate plot.

Parameters:
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
sortedTime - the series for survival times in ascending order.
sortedSurvivalEstimate - the survival estimates in descending order.
Returns:
the created Kaplan-Meier estimate plot.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentExceptio - the sortedTime vector and sortedSurvivalEstimate vector must have the same length.

createSurvivalEstimatePlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createSurvivalEstimatePlot(java.lang.String[] dataNames,
                                                             java.lang.String title,
                                                             java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                             java.lang.String yLabel,
                                                             double[][] sortedTime,
                                                             double[][] sortedSurvivalEstimate)
Creates a survival estimate plot.

Parameters:
dataNames - the names of these series,
dataNames[j]: the name of the (j+1)'th series.
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
sortedTime - the series of survival times in ascending order,
sortedTime[j]: the (j+1)'th series of survival times.
sortedSurvivalEstimate - the series of the survival estimates in descending order,
sortedSurvivalEstimate[j]: the (j+1)'th series of survival estimates.
Returns:
the created Kaplan-Meier estimate plot.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentExceptio - the sortedTime vector and sortedSurvivalEstimate vector must have the same length.

createSurvivalEstimatePlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createSurvivalEstimatePlot(java.lang.String title,
                                                             java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                             java.lang.String yLabel,
                                                             org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset dataset)
Creates a survival estimate plot using a XYDataset interface.

Parameters:
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
dataset - the data set for Kaplan-Meier estimate plot.
Returns:
the created Kaplan-Meier estimate plot.

createTimeSeriesPlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createTimeSeriesPlot(java.lang.String[] dataNames,
                                                       java.lang.String title,
                                                       java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                       java.lang.String yLabel,
                                                       int[][][] time,
                                                       double[]... data)
Creates a time series plot.

Parameters:
dataNames - the names of data series,
dataNames[j]: the name of the (j+1)'th time series.
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
time - the dates assoicated with the collection of time series,
time[j][i][0]: the second (0-59) associated with the i'th data of the j'th time series;
time[j][i][1]: the minute (0-59) associated with the i'th data of the j'th time series;
time[j][i][2]: the hour (0-23) associated with the i'th data of the j'th time series;
time[j][i][3]: the day (1-31) associated with the i'th data of the j'th time series;
time[j][i][4]: the month (1-12) associated with the i'th data of the j'th time series;
time[j][i][5]: the year (1900-9999) associated with the i'th data of the j'th time series.
data - a collection of time series, data[j]: the (j+1)'th data series.
Returns:
the created time series plot.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the number of time series should be equal to the one of the associated dates.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the length of the data series should be equal to the one of the associated dates.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the length of the time vector should be equal to 6.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the number of data series should be equal to the number of data names.

createTimeSeriesPlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createTimeSeriesPlot(java.lang.String title,
                                                       java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                       java.lang.String yLabel,
                                                       org.jfree.data.xy.XYDataset dataset)
Creates a time series plot.

Parameters:
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
yLabel - the label for the y-coordinate.
dataset - the dataset for the time series plot.
Returns:
the created regression plot.

createCombinedLineBarPlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createCombinedLineBarPlot(boolean isLinePlotUpper,
                                                            java.lang.String title,
                                                            java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                            java.lang.String linePlotYLabel,
                                                            java.lang.String barPlotYLabel,
                                                            org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset linePlotData,
                                                            org.jfree.data.category.CategoryDataset barPlotData)
Creates a combined line and bar plot using a CategoryDataset interface.

Parameters:
isLinePlotUpper - the boolean indicating whether the upper plot is the line plot.
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
linePlotYLabel - the label for the y-coordinate of the line plot.
barPlotYLabel - the label for the y-coordinate of the bar plot.
linePlotData - the dataset for the line plot.
barPlotData - the dataset for the bar plot.
Returns:
the created combined line and bar plot.

createCombinedLineBarPlot

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart createCombinedLineBarPlot(boolean isLinePlotUpper,
                                                            java.lang.String[] linePlotDataNames,
                                                            java.lang.String[] barPlotDataNames,
                                                            java.lang.String title,
                                                            java.lang.String xLabel,
                                                            java.lang.String linePlotYLabel,
                                                            java.lang.String barPlotYLabel,
                                                            java.lang.String[] category,
                                                            double[][] linePlotData,
                                                            double[][] barPlotData)
Creates a combined line and bar plot.

Parameters:
isLinePlotUpper - the boolean indicating whether the upper plot is the line plot.
linePlotDataNames - the names of the data series for the line plot, dataNames[j]: the name of the (j+1)'th data series.
barPlotDataNames - the names of the data series for the bar plot, dataNames[j]: the name of the (j+1)'th data series.
title - the plot title.
xLabel - the label for the x-coordinate.
linePlotYLabel - the label for the y-coordinate of the line plot.
barPlotYLabel - the label for the y-coordinate of the bar plot.
category - the categories the data belong to,
category[j]: the (j+1)'th category.
linePlotData - the data series for the line plot,
data[j]: the (j+1)'th data series.
barPlotData - the data series for the bar plot,
data[j]: the (j+1)'th data series.
Returns:
the created combined line and bar plot.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the length of the category vector should be equal to the one of the input data series.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the number of data series should be equal to the number of data names.

public org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart outputDeserialized(java.lang.String fileName)
Deserializes a plot object saved in the specified file.

Parameters:
fileName - the file name.
Returns:
the deserialized plot object.
